summary: Completed testing for Admin Buying Desk Management System. All 18 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - Admin login works, tabs navigate correctly, stats display properly. Footer links correctly point to Infosys URLs.

ui_bugs.issue: Data loading inconsistency - sometimes shows 0 requests, sometimes shows 8 requests. Requires clicking Refresh button to load data.

passed_tests: Admin Login - POST /api/admin/login with admin/admin123 returns success and token
Admin Login - Invalid credentials correctly rejected with 401
GET /api/admin/buying-desk/requests - Returns tactical buying requests with stats
GET /api/admin/buying-desk/requests?status=submitted - Filter by status works
GET /api/admin/buying-desk/specialists - Returns 5 specialists (Rajesh Kumar, Priya Sharma, Amit Patel, Sneha Reddy, Vikram Singh)
GET /api/admin/sourcing/requests - Returns sourcing requests with stats
GET /api/admin/sourcing/requests?urgency=urgent - Filter by urgency works
GET /api/admin/buying-desk/dashboard-stats - Returns dashboard statistics
PUT /api/admin/buying-desk/request/{id}/status - Updates tactical request status
PUT /api/admin/buying-desk/request/{id}/status - Invalid status rejected with 400
PUT /api/admin/buying-desk/request/{id}/assign - Assigns specialist to tactical request
POST /api/admin/buying-desk/request/{id}/note - Adds note to tactical request
PUT /api/admin/sourcing/request/{id}/status - Updates sourcing request status
PUT /api/admin/sourcing/request/{id}/assign - Assigns specialist to sourcing request
POST /api/admin/sourcing/request/{id}/note - Adds note to sourcing request
Footer - Privacy Policy link points to https://www.infosys.com/privacy-statement.html
Footer - Terms of Service link points to https://www.infosys.com/terms-of-use.html
Footer - Contact Us link points to https://www.infosysbpm.com/contact.html
Admin Portal Login UI - Login form with username/password fields and demo credentials hint
Admin Portal Dashboard - 4 tabs: Tactical Buying, Managed Services, Upload Catalog, Delivery Partners
Tactical Buying Tab - Stats cards: Total Requests, Pending Action, RFQ Sent, Negotiating, PO Ready
Managed Services Tab - Stats cards: Total Requests, Urgent/Critical, In Progress, RFQ Sent, Completed
Status Filter Dropdown - Shows all status options
Refresh Button - Triggers data reload
Logout Button - Returns to login page

admin_login.details: Login successful, token stored in localStorage

tactical_buying_tab.request_cards: Display request ID, customer, supplier, amount, potential savings, progress bar, assigned specialist
tactical_buying_tab.data_observed: 8 tactical requests, 5 pending, 2 RFQ sent, 1 negotiating

managed_services_tab.request_cards: Display sourcing ID, title, description, customer, category, budget, delivery location

action_items: OPTIONAL: Investigate data loading inconsistency on Tactical Buying tab - sometimes requires Refresh click to load data
critical_code_review_comments: Backend APIs are well-structured with proper validation and error handling
Admin authentication uses simple credential check - appropriate for demo
Specialist roster is hardcoded in BUYING_DESK_SPECIALISTS constant
Frontend AdminPortalPage.jsx properly uses data-testid attributes for login form elements
Tab switching triggers loadBuyingDeskData() function to fetch data

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all features working, minor data loading inconsistency)

seed_data_creation: Test data exists in database - 8 tactical buying requests, 2 sourcing requests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Buying Desk Management System fully tested. All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend admin portal accessible at /admin with credentials admin/admin123. Tactical Buying tab shows 8 requests with various statuses. Managed Services tab shows 2 sourcing requests. All CRUD operations (status update, assign specialist, add note) working via API. Footer links correctly point to Infosys URLs.
